neighborhoods.name: Florentin
neighborhoods.description: Trendy neighborhood known for street art, nightlife, and young creative community.

neighborhoods.name: Kerem Hateimanim
neighborhoods.description: Historic Yemenite quarter with authentic restaurants and traditional architecture.

neighborhoods.name: Neve Tzedek
neighborhoods.description: Charming historic neighborhood with boutique shops, galleries, and cafes.

neighborhoods.name: Tel Aviv Port (Namal)
neighborhoods.description: Waterfront area with restaurants, bars, and weekend markets along the Mediterranean.

neighborhoods.name: Rothschild Boulevard
neighborhoods.description: Tree-lined boulevard with Bauhaus architecture, cafes, and central location.

neighborhoods.name: City Center
neighborhoods.description: Main commercial area with shops, restaurants, and easy access to the beach.

neighborhoods.name: Kiryat Hasharon
neighborhoods.description: Residential neighborhood with parks and family-friendly atmosphere.

neighborhoods.name: Ir Yamim
neighborhoods.description: Upscale neighborhood near the beach with modern apartments.

neighborhoods.name: Le Marais
neighborhoods.description: Historic district with trendy boutiques, galleries, and vibrant nightlife.

neighborhoods.name: Montmartre
neighborhoods.description: Artistic hilltop neighborhood with Sacré-Cœur and charming streets.

neighborhoods.name: Latin Quarter
neighborhoods.description: Student area with universities, bookshops, and lively atmosphere.

neighborhoods.name: Saint-Germain-des-Prés
neighborhoods.description: Upscale Left Bank neighborhood with cafes, galleries, and luxury shopping.

neighborhoods.name: Shibuya
neighborhoods.description: Vibrant district famous for the scramble crossing, shopping, and nightlife.

neighborhoods.name: Shinjuku
neighborhoods.description: Major commercial hub with skyscrapers, entertainment, and transport links.

neighborhoods.name: Asakusa
neighborhoods.description: Traditional area with Senso-ji Temple and old Tokyo atmosphere.

neighborhoods.name: Harajuku
neighborhoods.description: Youth culture center known for fashion, cafes, and Meiji Shrine.

neighborhoods.name: Shoreditch
neighborhoods.description: Trendy East London area with street art, tech startups, and nightlife.

neighborhoods.name: Notting Hill
neighborhoods.description: Charming area with colorful houses, Portobello Market, and cafes.

neighborhoods.name: Camden
neighborhoods.description: Alternative neighborhood famous for markets, music venues, and canal.

neighborhoods.name: South Kensington
neighborhoods.description: Upscale area with museums, Victorian architecture, and green spaces.

neighborhoods.name: Manhattan
neighborhoods.description: The heart of NYC with iconic landmarks, business districts, and culture.

neighborhoods.name: Brooklyn
neighborhoods.description: Diverse borough with trendy neighborhoods, parks, and waterfront views.

neighborhoods.name: Williamsburg
neighborhoods.description: Hip Brooklyn neighborhood with art scene, music venues, and cafes.

neighborhoods.name: Upper West Side
neighborhoods.description: Family-friendly Manhattan area with Central Park and cultural institutions.

neighborhoods.name: Surry Hills
neighborhoods.description: Trendy inner-city area with cafes, restaurants, and boutique shopping.

neighborhoods.name: Bondi
neighborhoods.description: Famous beach suburb with surf culture, coastal walks, and cafes.

neighborhoods.name: The Rocks
neighborhoods.description: Historic waterfront area with cobblestone streets and weekend markets.

neighborhoods.name: Newtown
neighborhoods.description: Alternative neighborhood with diverse dining, vintage shops, and arts.

neighborhoods.name: Bandra
neighborhoods.description: Upscale neighborhood with trendy cafes, boutiques, and nightlife.

neighborhoods.name: Colaba
neighborhoods.description: Historic waterfront area with Gateway of India and colonial architecture.

neighborhoods.name: Andheri
neighborhoods.description: Commercial hub with mix of residential, business, and entertainment.

neighborhoods.name: Downtown Dubai
neighborhoods.description: Iconic area with Burj Khalifa, Dubai Mall, and luxury living.

neighborhoods.name: Dubai Marina
neighborhoods.description: Waterfront community with skyscrapers, restaurants, and beach access.

neighborhoods.name: Jumeirah
neighborhoods.description: Upscale residential area along the coast with villas and beaches.
